name: eggd_annotate_excluded_regions
title: eggd_annotate_excluded_regions
summary: Annotates and filters excluded bed file for CNV reports

inputSpec.name: excluded_regions
inputSpec.help: This is the excluded regions file outputted from the eggd_GATKgCNV_call app.

inputSpec.name: panel_bed
inputSpec.help: The bed generated by generate_bed app which contains the genomic regions for this patient's panel

inputSpec.name: cds_hgnc
inputSpec.help: This is file contains all CDS regions using HGNC_IDs from NCBI GFF cache is tsv format.

inputSpec.name: cds_gene
inputSpec.help: This is file contains all CDS regions using GENE SYMBOLS from NCBI GFF cache is tsv format.

inputSpec.name: additional_regions
inputSpec.label: File containing chrom, start, end, HGNC ID, transcript, exon.
inputSpec.help: Primarily used for generating panels for CNV annotation where additional regions are required.

outputSpec.name: annotated_excluded_file
outputSpec.help: Bed file with excluded regions filtered to panels and annotated
